qa_multi_document_compare.question: According to the hospitalization records of Newport General Hospital and Yorkshire General Hospital, who was admitted earlier, V. Lewis or I. Chavez?
qa_multi_document_compare.answer: V. Lewis was admitted on July 23, and I. Chavez was admitted on February 12. I. Chavez was admitted earlier.
